mapper.update:
update tx_channel
tx_status = #{txStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
out_serial_no = #{outSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_tx_end_time = #{outTxEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
out_settle_date = #{outSettleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_resp_code = #{outRespCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_resp_desc = #{outRespDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where channel_serial_no = #{channelSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cust_id = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from tx_channel where channel_tx_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and channel_tx_time <= #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and tx_status in ('0', '3') and channel_trade_type NOT IN ('ACCPAY', 'AGTPAY', 'WHPAY', 'UB') LIMIT 500
